name: True Love
summary: Set in Margate, each episode, created by actor improvisation, acts as a self-contained story, though all five stories are set in the same place and time and roughly interlink: A married man is torn between his family and his first love; a female teacher develops feelings for a female pupil; a middle aged woman ponders how to deal with stale marriage and cheating husband; a new father experiences love at first sight with a younger woman; and a divorcée searching for true love deals with an obsessive stalker.
info:
• 中文名: 真爱故事
  • 放送星期: Sunday
  • 配角: Joanne Froggatt
  • 集数: 5
  • 开始: 17 Jun 2012
  • 类型: Relationships & Romance
  • 国家/地区: UK
  • 语言: English
  • 每集长: 30 minutes
  • 频道: BBC ONE
  • 首播国家: UK
